commentText:
Represents a pending asynchronous Realm task, like asynchronous transactions.

Users are responsible for maintaining a reference to {@code RealmAsyncTask} in order to call {@link #cancel()} in case of a configuration change for example (to avoid memory leak, as the transaction will post the result to the caller's thread callback).

methods.commentText: Attempts to cancel execution of this transaction (if it hasn't already completed or previously cancelled).

methods.name: cancel

methods.commentText: Checks whether an attempt to cancel the transaction was performed.

tags.name: @return
tags.text: {@code true} if {@link #cancel()} has already been called, {@code false} otherwise.
